price: Ahuntasεm ne badwam Nimdefoͻ no, Ɔkorͻn kyεn deε wͻde bata (Ne ho nyinaa).
arabic: عَٰلِمِ ٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَٱلشَّهَٰدَةِ فَتَعَٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: ʿālimi al-ghaybi wal-shahādati fataʿālā ʿammā yush'rikūna
